version_name: 2.0 is finally here! This release is jam packed with brand new features and updates that will take your Geocaching experience to a whole other level.If you love Cachly please consider leaving us a review on the App Store

Version 2.0 is finally here! This release is jam packed with brand new features and updates that will take your Geocaching experience to a whole other level.

Cachly 3.0 is finally here! We are bringing you some very powerful new features as well as some amazing performance enhancements to make offline caching even better. This release has the following:

- Offline List Performance Upgrades: allow for mas

Fixed a performance issue when users had a large amount of offline caches.

Please contact support@cach.ly with any questions!

We are always trying to make Cachly better and better. If you have any questions or concerns please contact support@cach.ly. Feel free to leave us a review on the App Store if you love Cachly!

In this release:

- Log dates were showing incorr

Cachly 3.0.3 includes the following:

Features

- FTF indicator! Shows caches that have not been found and are available for an FTF. - Premium feature
- New Found and DNF icons
- Owned Events can now post an Announcement log
- Export

Cachly 3.1 is finally here! With this release comes some amazing new features:

- Multiple log text templates
- User logs can be filtered by different log types
- Filtering options for Found Date, Downloaded Date, Last Update Date and Last Fou

Cachly 4.0 is here! With this release comes some amazing new features:

- Official iPad support
- Landscape support
- Filter Templates that can be reused
- Create and edit offline caches
- Phone or text a friend if you have that username
Dutch translation fixes

Cachly 4.1 is here!

Scan Trackables that have QR codes
Trackable Pending Logs has new updated design
Trackable Pending Logs now has bulk upload
Pending Logs bulk uploading now allows selecting which logs to upload
Sync highlighting acro

Cachly 4.2 is here! With this release comes some amazing new features including the ability to edit logs.

Log Enhancements
• Edit Logs
• Delete Logs
• Add Photos to Created Logs

• Additional legacy cache types added to filters
•
Bug fixes

Cachly 4.3 is here! With this release comes some amazing new features including support for Apple Watch. Here is the full list:

• Apple Watch App
• Load caches button has been moved to bottom of map
• Filter Live caches moved to filter button
Small fix to make Metaverse links work correctly.

• Apple Watch Cachly Complication for quick access
• Fix for pairing Apple Watch with iOS device
• Bug fixes

Questions or comments please contact support@cach.ly.

• Fix for pairing Apple Watch with iOS device
• Bug fixes

Questions or comments please contact support@cach.ly.
Updates to Cachly friends functionality which now allows for integration of Geocaching friends.
Fixed a crashing issue with friends.

Due to recent privacy updates and GDPR regulations we have had to remove the friends feature from Cachly. We are very sorry about these changes.

- Friends have been removed from the More tab
- Adding Friends has been removed from user profiles

Due to recent privacy updates and GDPR regulations some user profile features had to be removed. Current users can still view all previous user profile data.

We also fixed some bugs with importing GPX files.

Due to recent privacy updates and GDPR regulations some user profile features had to be removed. Current users can still view all previous user profile data.

We also fixed some bugs with importing GPX files.
Small bug fixes!

If you are loving Cachly 5 please make sure to leave a review in the App Store!

- Drafts can now be sent without log text
- Battery saving enhancements, turning off GPS when not needed
- Option to Tip the Developer on the More tab
- Contou

If you are loving Cachly please make sure to leave a review in the App Store!

- New Catalan translation
- Settings option to disable map tilt
- Drafts can now upload multiple images

- Fixed: Logging a Webcam cache "Webcam Photo Taken"
Additional bug fixes

Cachly 5.1 brings some great new features including major Premium Offline Map speed enhancements, custom labels for highlight colors, cache find counts and much more.

Fixes a crash when creating corrected coordinates.

Bug fixes:

- Creating and deleting waypoints not working correctly
- Waypoints given strange name on creating
- Owned cache star still showing for caches that were adopted out

- Trackable Travels returns!
- Cache Additional Details: County, State and Country should be moved up higher in list
- Exported .txt file shows null for message
- Exported .txt file should remove new line characters which break GSAK import

Bug fixes

Cachly 5.2 brings some great new features including viewing multiple Premium Offline Maps at once, Friends return, users who favorited a cache and much more!

If you love Cachly please make sure to leave us a review on the App Store, it really helps

- Corrected Coordinates can now be edited by swiping that row on the cache details screen and choosing Edit
- Regular geocaching users can now create Corrected Coordinates
- Bug fixes
